jobs_description.title: WordPress Web Developer
jobs_description.description: I was in charge of developing WordPress websites for clients in Nicaragua, during my time at the agency I contributed my knowledge in web security by increasing measures and decreasing security gaps in WordPress, configuring plugins and setting HTTP headers such as Content-Security-Policy (CSP), Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy (CORP), Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy (COOP), etc.

projects.title: Calculadora Payoneer Nicaragua
projects.description: Discover an essential tool for freelancers and businesses in Nicaragua. Our Calculadora Payoneer Nicaragua allows you to calculate precisely and quickly the rates and commissions when receiving international payments through Payoneer. Start using it today and take control of your finances!

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm a web developer enthusiast with an obsession about automation the tedious tasks.
about.description: Experienced Full-Stack Developer with a strong background in modern web frameworks, backend technologies, cloud platforms, and DevOps. Passionate about building scalable applications with a focus on performance, security, and SEO optimization. Adept at working with microservices, event-driven architectures, and cloud infrastructure. Side hobby as a blogger and content creator with high emphasis on styling and intergrity.
